blurb: A full-stack application that manages Minecraft servers over a LAN.

name: NoPerish (macOS)
blurb: An AppKit app that pings NationStates every time the user logs in.

blurb: A desktop app that pings NationStates every time the computer starts up.

name: home-programs
blurb: A collection of Python scripts that manages the FTP backup of my house's camera system.
